text: David Ginola-Ceze (born 25 January 1967) is a former French football player. He has played for Toulon, RC Paris, Brest, Paris Saint-Germain, Newcastle United, Tottenham Hotspur, Aston Villa, Everton, and the France national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances
